properties.entry: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_COUNT AS BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_RECOMMEND AS BOARD_RECOMMEND, B.USER_NO AS USER_NO, R.REPLY_COUNT AS REPLY_COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE,'MMDDHH24MI') BOARD_DATE, A.CHANGE_NAME AS CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.REF_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON B.USER_NO = R.REPLY_NO WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = ?

SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_COUNT AS BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_RECOMMEND AS BOARD_RECOMMEND, B.USER_NO AS USER_NO, R.REPLY_COUNT AS REPLY_COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE,'MMDDHH24MI') BOARD_DATE, A.CHANGE_NAME AS CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.REF_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON B.USER_NO = R.REPLY_NO WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TITLE like ? ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = ? AND B.BOARD_TITLE like ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, B.USER_NO, REPLY_COUNT, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 AND TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE) > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYYMMDDHH') AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_COUNT desc , Board_RECOMMEND desc
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NO, BOARD_TYPE) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO , REF_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ?, 1)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ?, FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ?, FILE_PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_NO = ?

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NO) FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y') REPLY_COUNT, BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_RECOMMEND, USER_NO, B.BOARD_DATE, M.NICKNAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS ='Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
SELECT BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y' AND @ LIKE ? ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_COUNT = BOARD_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, BOARD_NO, USER_NO) VALUES(SEQ_RYNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_NO, M.NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(REPLY_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') REPLY_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M using(user_no) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY REPLY_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, REPLY_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, B.USER_NO, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.USER_NO = ?
SELECT R.REPLY_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, R.REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(R.REPLY_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') REPLY_DATE, R.USER_NO FROM REPLY R LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD B USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = ?
